answers.author: Gregory Crocker
answers.text:
I think the best place to start would be with the state EPA or Public Health or Department of Natural Resources.  Wish I could be of more assistance.

author: Brian Terry
text: I need information cocerning a residence using a private above ground storeage tank that is being used as a potable water supply. The owners can not connect to a public water supply and they are paying an individual to tranport water to supply water to their manufactured home. Are there any regulations or departments that I can contact for answers?
title: Private Water Storeage Tanks
